elements.title: If you place the folders directly on the desktop, you will find the files most quickly.

elements.name: question10
elements.title: Justification:
elements.correctAnswer: Permanently storing files and folders on the desktop is not a solution. Collaborative working and the use of multiple end devices is not possible. Furthermore, the desktop is soon full and the relevant files cannot be found.
